content.question: Which of the following policies would a government be likely to undertake to address gender equity in a political system?

choices.label: Limiting access to family planning and education
Implementing gender equity wage policies and reducing taxes
Increasing access to family planning and limiting access to education
Implementing gender quotas in legislative elections and improving access to education

content.answer: Implementing gender quotas in legislative elections and improving access to education

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development
